TITLE GOES HERE: The following code chunk throws an error. Why?

```{r error=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>%
  filter(cylinders == 4)
```

What is the problem? 

<!--answer-start-->
There is no variable called `cylinders` in `mtcars`.
<!--answer-end-->
